Key Strengths: Clear delineation of customer responsibilities regarding conduit and cable extensions.
Specific instructions for site preparation and MPOE identification.
Critical Weaknesses: Lack of clarity on liability and risk allocation for installation failures.
No provisions for service level agreements or support during installation.
Priority Recommendations: Incorporate clear liability clauses to protect both parties.
Define service level agreements for installation and support.

Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Commentary: No term or renewal provisions are mentioned, which is critical for long-term agreements.

Term & Renewal.Deviation from Best Practices: Missing clear terms for contract duration and renewal options.
Term & Renewal.Improvement Opportunities: Include initial term, renewal terms, and termination notice periods.

Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Clause: Customer shall be responsible, at its own expense
Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Commentary: Financial responsibilities are outlined, but no payment terms or late fees are specified.

Payment & Financial Terms.Deviation from Best Practices: Lack of defined payment terms and late fee structure.
Payment & Financial Terms.Improvement Opportunities: Add payment terms, late fee structure, and billing dispute resolution.

Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Clause: Frontier will not physically build into or on private property
Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Commentary: No service level agreements or performance metrics are provided.

Service Level Agreements.Deviation from Best Practices: Absence of service level definitions and credit mechanisms.
Service Level Agreements.Improvement Opportunities: Establish service level agreements with defined response times and penalties.

Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Clause: Moving the Frontier NID from the MPOE is not supported
Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Commentary: No limitation of liability or indemnification clauses are present.

Risk Allocation.Deviation from Best Practices: Uncapped liability exposure and lack of indemnification.
Risk Allocation.Improvement Opportunities: Include liability caps and indemnification provisions.

Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Clause: The path/conduit from the edge of the property to the MPOE must be provided by the customer
Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Commentary: Operational responsibilities are clear, but installation timelines are not defined.

Operational Terms.Deviation from Best Practices: No clear installation processes or maintenance notifications.
Operational Terms.Improvement Opportunities: Define installation timelines and maintenance notification procedures.

Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Clause: If you need assistance or have questions
Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Commentary: No data protection or compliance measures are mentioned.

Security & Compliance.Deviation from Best Practices: Lack of data protection and compliance provisions.
Security & Compliance.Improvement Opportunities: Include data protection measures and compliance obligations.

Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Clause: Customer must extend from that location as needed
Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Commentary: No mention of regulatory compliance or technical standards.

Regulatory Compliance & Technical Requir.Improvement Opportunities: Incorporate compliance with FCC and state regulations.

Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Clause: This form requires use of the full Adobe Acrobat program
Provisions with Detailed Analysis.Commentary: No clear amendment procedures or dispute resolution mechanisms.

Contract Administration.Deviation from Best Practices: Lack of clear contract administration processes.
Contract Administration.Improvement Opportunities: Define amendment procedures and dispute resolution mechanisms.

High-Priority: Incorporate liability caps and service level agreements.
Medium-Priority: Define termination provisions and data protection measures.

Must-Have Changes: Add clear terms for contract duration, renewal, and termination.
Define payment terms and late fee structures.
Nice-to-Have Improvements: Establish service level agreements with defined metrics.
Include data protection and compliance provisions.
Strategic Considerations: Regularly review and update the MSA to align with industry standards.
Implementation Priorities: Immediate focus on liability and service level definitions.
Subsequent focus on operational and compliance improvements.
